dataType.name: Ordinary
dataType.description: This is an ordinary data type.

dataType.name: ULDescription
dataType.description: * This is a list item. * This is another. Named data type whose description begins with an itemized list.

dataType.name: OLDescription
dataType.description: # This is a list item. # This is another. Named data type whose description begins with a numbered list.

dataType.name: CodeDescription
dataType.description: print("Hello") Named data type whose description begins with code.

reference.name: TR-106 Amendment 8
reference.title: Data Model Template for CWMP Endpoints and USP Agents
